subject: Building Access Logs
body:
Maverick,

Can you send me a summary of unusual badge access attempts for the last two weeks? We may need it for an upcoming audit.

Thanks,
Amanda

subject: Re: Building Access Logs
body:
Amanda,

I’ll pull the report and have it over by COB today.

- Maverick

subject: FOIA Request Review
body:
Marcus,

We received another FOIA request touching on some sensitive case notes. I need your eyes on it before we release anything.

-Amanda

subject: Follow-up on Autopsy Timeline
body:
Rachel,

Where do we stand on the Englund case autopsy report? I need to give DC a realistic timeline.

-Amanda

subject: Re: Follow-up on Autopsy Timeline
body:
Amanda,

Preliminary results are complete. Final toxicology is still pending—likely another 48 hours.

- Rachel

subject: Cyber Briefing Prep
body:
Nick,

HQ has requested a quick-read brief on regional cyber threats. Can you prepare a one-pager by early next week?

Thanks,
Amanda

subject: Court Appearance Reminder
body:
Wyatt,

You’re scheduled to testify on the Jefferson case Tuesday morning. Please coordinate with Marcus for prep.

-Amanda

subject: Case Load Update
body:
Amelia,

HQ is asking for weekly updates on our domestic terrorism caseload. Please draft a consolidated report for Friday.

-Amanda

subject: Travel Request Approval
body:
Noah,

Your travel request to Charlotte has been approved. Make sure logistics has your itinerary.

-Amanda

subject: Informant Debrief
body:
Oliver,

Please schedule a debrief with the Henderson informant no later than Wednesday. Let me know if you anticipate any issues.

-Amanda

subject: Camera Outage
body:
Maverick,

Facilities reported an outage on the south entrance cameras. Can you verify if this was scheduled maintenance or something unexpected?

-Amanda

subject: Medical Leave Paperwork
body:
Rachel,

Please make sure Dr. Singh’s medical leave paperwork is routed through HR by Thursday.

Thanks,
Amanda

subject: Encryption Issue
body:
Nick,

I’ve been flagged about some agents not updating their encryption keys. Can you confirm compliance across your team?

-Amanda

subject: Grand Jury Scheduling
body:
Marcus,

DOJ needs our proposed dates for the Jefferson case grand jury. Please get with Wyatt and send me options.

-Amanda

subject: Debrief Notes
body:
Amelia,

Forward me your debrief notes on the Asheville tech startup case once they’re cleaned up. I need them for Monday’s staff meeting.

-Amanda

subject: Case Coordination
body:
Noah,

Cross-check your current case assignments with Oliver’s. I don’t want duplication of effort.

Thanks,
Amanda

subject: Case File Submission
body:
Oliver,

Please finalize and submit the Asheville gang task force case file to HQ by Friday. Let me know if you hit any blockers.

-Amanda

subject: Range Certification
body:
Wyatt,

Your firearms certification is expiring this month. Get with training to schedule requalification.

-Amanda

subject: Visitor Badges
body:
Maverick,

We’ll have DOJ auditors visiting next Thursday. Please arrange temporary badges and escort procedures.

Thanks,
Amanda

subject: Wellness Briefing
body:
Rachel,

HQ is rolling out a new wellness program. I’d like you to lead a short briefing on stress management for the field staff next week.

-Amanda
